description:
"I never usually like someone bigger than me."
That's what Barry had to say about sex in general. Our football-player-wrestler stud is back and pairing him with the (slightly) smaller Devin seemed just the right fit.
Barry always seems so shy and reserved so when he started devouring Devin's ass it was quite a nice surprise.
Barry and Devin are both pure beef, so for me watching Barry fuck the shit out of Devin was a real treat.
"It felt good," Barry said afterward. "His ass is nice and tight!"
title: Barry & Devin
